titleStmt.title: The evaporation of the apple of Palæstine: that is, The sifting of the answeres and rescripts, lately given, in the cause of the restitution of the Palatinate Together with a briefe demonstration of the nullities of the clandestine dispositions, by which, the electourship and the Palatinate hath beene transferred on the house of Bavaria. Translated out of Latine.
Pomi Palaestini evaporatio. English
titleStmt.author: Rusdorf, Johann Joachim von, 1589-1640.

titleStmt.title: The evaporation of the apple of Palæstine: that is, The sifting of the answeres and rescripts, lately given, in the cause of the restitution of the Palatinate Together with a briefe demonstration of the nullities of the clandestine dispositions, by which, the electourship and the Palatinate hath beene transferred on the house of Bavaria. Translated out of Latine.
Pomi Palaestini evaporatio. English
titleStmt.author: Rusdorf, Johann Joachim von, 1589-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. G[riffin] for Ioyce Norton, and Richard Whitaker, and are to be sold at the Kings Armes in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed "Volradus a Trubach", a misprint for the Latin edition's "Volradus a Frubach", i.e. Johann Joachim von Rusdorf.
Running title reads: The sifting of the imperiall answeres.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
